mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHOCOCO_MEMBER (userName, userEmail, userPass, birth_year, birth_month, birth_day, sex, address) values (#{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPass}, #{birth_year}, #{birth_month}, #{birth_day}, #{sex}, null)
mapper.update: update chococo_member set birth_year = #{birth_year}, birth_month = #{birth_month}, birth_day = #{birth_day}, sex = #{sex}, address = #{address} where userEmail = #{userEmail}
update chococo_member set userPass = #{userPass} where userEmail = #{userEmail}
mapper.select: select count(*) from chococo_member where userName = #{userName}
select count(*) from chococo_member where userEmail = #{userEmail}
select couponNumber, content, ratio from chococo_coupon where to_char(couponNumber) = #{couponNumber} and isUse = 1
select count(*) from chococo_member_coupon where to_char(couponNumber) = #{couponNumber} and userName = #{userName}
mapper.insert: insert into chococo_member_coupon (userName, userEmail, couponNumber, content, ratio, usedDate) values (#{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{couponNumber}, #{content}, #{ratio}, null)
mapper.select: select * from chococo_member_coupon where userName = #{userName} and dateOfUse > sysdate and usedDate is null
